publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2413 Shiona Baird:Historic Scotland Ranger Service, Holyrood Park—That the Parliament commends the Historic Scotland Ranger Service for its dedicated work in preserving the unique heritage of Holyrood Park; congratulates it on organising walks for MSPs during the Parliament’s Environment Week to inform them of this heritage, and urges more MSPs to engage with the fascinating history and archaeology on their doorstep.

S2M-2413 Historic Scotland Ranger Service, Holyrood Park (lodged on 9 February 2005) Chris Ballance*, Rob Gibson*, Mike Pringle*, Eleanor Scott*, Robin Harper*, Mark Ballard*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Colin Fox*, Murray Tosh*

S2M-2413 Shiona Baird:Historic Scotland Ranger Service, Holyrood Park—That the Parliament commends the Historic Scotland Ranger Service for its dedicated work in preserving the unique heritage of Holyrood Park; congratulates it on organising walks for MSPs during the Parliament’s Environment Week to inform them of this heritage, and urges more MSPs to engage with the fascinating history and archaeology on their doorstep. Supported by: Chris Ballance, Rob Gibson, Mike Pringle, Eleanor Scott, Robin Harper, Mark Ballard, Roseanna Cunningham, Colin Fox, Murray Tosh, Dr Jean Turner*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mr David Davidson*, Ms Sandra White*, Patrick Harvie*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-2413 Historic Scotland Ranger Service, Holyrood Park (lodged on 9 February 2005) Sarah Boyack*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Christine Grahame*
S2M-2413 Historic Scotland Ranger Service, Holyrood Park (lodged on 9 February 2005) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-2413 Historic Scotland Ranger Service, Holyrood Park (lodged on 9 February 2005) Trish Godman*
S2M-2413 Historic Scotland Ranger Service, Holyrood Park (lodged on 9 February 2005) Alex Neil*
